summary: We reviewed U.S. Department of Agriculture programs that provide financial assistance to farmers and ranchers. We found that USDA provided $161 billion in assistance from FY2019-2023. Of that, 42% went to those affected by international trade disruptions, the pandemic, and natural disasters. Additionally, about 1 million farmers and ranchers received assistance each year. The number of those who are part of historically underserved groups—e.g., new...
title: Farm Programs: USDA Financial Assistance to Agricultural Producers for Fiscal Years 2019–2023
